suppress.notes:
File name: spring-web-5.3.22.jar
Suppressed for 6 months
A JIRA ticket has been created to track this vulnerability - https://companieshouse.atlassian.net/browse/DEBT-1742
It is unlikely that this library will be updated and therefore that the suppression will be removed.

File names: tomcat-embed-core-9.0.64.jar AND tomcat-embed-websocket-9.0.64.jar
Suppressed for 6 months
A JIRA ticket has been created to track this vulnerability - https://companieshouse.atlassian.net/browse/DEBT-1743
The library should be updated and this suppression removed once a new Tomcat version is released.
